title: Tivo SAAS Template
body:
‘Tivo’ is a free HTML SaaS Landing Page template built by[ Inovatik](https://inovatik.com/). Features include a sticky header navigation that smooth scrolls to sections, services overview, feature carousal with Lightbox functionality, video modal, pricing table, testimonial slider and ends with a newsletter sign up box.

Check out the [live demo](https://inovatik.com/tivo-landing-page/index.html)!

![Tivo HTML Template](/images/uploads/tivo.jpg)
